items.sentence: In retrospect, Tom realized he shouldn\'t have been dating both sisters at the same time.
Tom couldn\'t understand why his daughter would want to have her tongue and nose pierced.
Tom and Mary ran off to Boston and got married after knowing each other only a few weeks.
Tom and Mary were friends in high school and started dating a few years after graduating.
Tom attended high school for three years without missing a single day or ever being late.
Tom certainly had a point when he said we should allow more time to complete the project.
Tom killed Mary because he found out she had started the fire that had killed his family.
Tom got his learner\'s permit yesterday, so he\'s out with his father practicing driving.
The police spent hours searching Tom\'s place, but they couldn\'t find the murder weapon.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that we\'ll ever get any help from the national government.
Tom\'s mother is a nurse at the hospital that\'s across the street from where Mary lives.
Tom is always a little irritable in the morning before he drinks his first cup of coffee.
Since I have no children, I have more time to spend doing volunteer work than parents do.
The bartender walked over to where Tom was sitting and asked him what he wanted to drink.
Tom wanted to build his own house, but gave up after realizing how much work it would be.
Tom and Mary gave exactly the same answers on the test which made the teacher suspicious.
Tom thought he could reach the airport on time if he drove a little over the speed limit.
Tom shaved off his beard and dyed his hair blonde, hoping people wouldn\'t recognize him.
Tom stared at Mary for a moment wondering if there was something she wasn\'t telling him.
Tom wanted to give you a surprise party, but I knew you\'d hate it, so I told him not to.
